modName: Servants in Livery - Stewards Uniforms - USLEEP Patch
summary: An adaptation of Kidhedera's mod patched to work with USLEEP instead that with USKP.
descriptionHtml:
[center][u]Original mod:[/u]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51566]https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51566[/url]ï»¿

[u]Credits to:[/u]
Kobayashi for his textures.
Kidhedera for the recolored textures and the original esp.

[u]Description:[/u]
Since I've liked Kidhedera's mod I just patched it to work with USLEEP instead that with USKP.
Original mod is NOT needed.

[u]Installation:[/u]
Drop Meshes and Textures folders and the *.esp file in your Data folder, allow merging when required.[/center]
author: Giizis

files.name: Servants in Livery - Stewards Uniforms - USLEEP Patch
